messages.title: My local issues are
messages.content: Keep Sheffield safe - zero tolerance on crime. Reward Sheffield's hard workers - no tax on minimum wage.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say YES to referendums on all major issues
Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels

issues.brexitEurope: Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels
issues.governance: Say YES to referendums on all major issues

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived all my life in Rotherham and Sheffield. I genuinely care about the local area, having worked with local charities and clubs. As a candidate who lives in the constituency, I understand the needs of local people because I face the same problems.

politicalExperience.role: local teacher and special needs co-ordinator
politicalExperience.achievements: I understand that you will expect me to work tirelessly on your behalf if you elect me.

images.caption: Election communication for the UK Independence Party - Charlotte Arnott for Sheffield Heeley
